data.text: @blakandblack So much easier to believe armageddon that to rise off our collective butts and fix what we have done. Peace on Earth is our responsibility. We were charged to keep the peace and respect the planet and all of the species on it. No rapture will save those who don't. A christian.

@blakandblack the gathering together at Megiddo is the last thing to happen in History...just before fire comes down from Heaven n consumes those amassed...few things to go on 'tween now n then..not a lot tho ..
Praise God ..😏
